data.text:
8 September 2021

Comfortable, superior-quality couches to add a crowning touch to dining rooms

At Gamadecor, we continue to innovate, expanding our range so as to offer the very best in design for the home. This is illustrated by one of the latest additions to our furniture: a selection of comfortable, superior-quality couches, conceived to bring a stylish modern allure to dining rooms.

One prime feature is their dismountable design, so that they can be delivered in sections. This means that they take up less room when delivered, minimizing the risk of damage, and saving on plastic and other packaging materials. Another major feature of our couches is their comfort and non-deformable seating, thanks to a design made of bonded layers of foam of varying hardnesses. This guarantees superb comfort, with cushions that spring back and always look as good as new, despite heavy use.

These comfortable, superior-quality couches are also reversible. This means that they can be mounted in a right or left-hand design (for instance, with the arm on the left and the chaise on the right or vice versa). The seats can also be positioned to face different ways, like a tête-à-tête chair.

Another important feature is the removable upholstery. The base upholstery, seat cushions and back are fixed in place with velcro, making them swift and easy to remove. The covers of the seat and back cushions have a simple zip system to take them off. The seating features an exclusive suspension system, joined to the seat cushions (as opposed to conventional frame-based suspension systems). This guarantees comfortable long-lasting seating, able to retain its shape.
